page.title: 18SATURDAY ROUTINE- BOY 8YRS
page.content: "I got up and read to my younger brother. Iwent downstairs and fed the cats. I fed the lambs with 500g of feed, made sure the hurdles were shut and washed my hands. Then Louise, Daddy and Guy came down to make the breakfast porridge, ( crushed oats boiled in milk with sugar to sweeten). Then we went with Mummy in the car, to pick up a friend. We had an ice-lolly each. When we got home we played in the paddling pool. My friend came to play, and we had a campfire lunch of sausages and baked beans. I helped Daddy mend a wheel_ barrow, and he mended my cycle wheel. We spent 4 hours watching to see if our cat had kittens and then we had tea, poached eggs on toast, then we went to bed." Family- Father is an airline pilot. Mother is in part-time business as a potter, ex-teacher.
